transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Boliye mam.
Executive: Good morning sir, main Nishita baat kar rahi thi mam IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye Nishita.
Executive: Ji aapki service ke regarding feedback ke liye call kara tha, kaisi ja rahi hai?
Customer: Boliye na mam.
Executive: Sir ek service ke feedback ke regarding call kara hai, kaisi chal rahi hai aapki service?
Customer: Nahi service toh jaisi hai waisi chal rahi hai, usme toh koi abhi kya dekhenge aapki team woh woh toh mana kar diya hai. Tab toh chal rahi hai nahi chal rahi koi meaning hi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir main technically batati hu ki baat kya hai ki aapka jo aapke paas jo trademark hai, hai na woh Jory Bites ki hai. Theek hai? Yeh cheeze out of the box understandable hai ki kya problem aa rahi hai par usko prove karna sir mushkil hai. Aapko bhi pata hai ki legally agar hum kuch bhi cheeze prove karne jaate hai toh woh exact woh documents demand karte hai jahan se hum cheeze prove kar sake. Yeh humne humare aapko nahi aapko kya proof chahiye? Mera aapko bataya ki aapko mera registration chahiye toh main aapko de sakta hu. Kal wohi company ne kal hoke abhi usne market mein woh product nikala hai. Okay. Toh woh toh usme kya proof dunga main aap bataiye.
Executive: Main wohi baat suniye dekhiye aapke paas jo hai woh Jory Bites ka hai. Theek hai? Usne jo launch kiya woh Jolly Bites hai. Ab aap bataiye aapke paas jo trademark hai woh toh Jory ka hai, Jolly ka toh nahi hai. Toh aap kaise prove karoge ki usne aapko copy kiya hai? Yeh toh yeh toh humari understanding hai ki hum jaante hai ki market mein woh insaan kya karta hai, aap us insaan ko personally jaante ho. Hai na? But aapko agar court mein aap legally prove karne jaoge toh woh toh aapko mangega na ki aap mujhe iske regarding trademark dijiye. Problem pata hai yahan yeh phas rahi hai ki aapka jo bhi yeh competitor hai, hai na? Inhone bahut hi sharply mind use karke inhone cheeze copy kara hai taki kahin se bhi inke upar koi action na liya ja sake.
Customer: Nahi aisa hota nahi hai mam. Dekho simple baat hai, example main batata hu. Aap aap main aapke portal pe registered hu. Okay? Aur wohi company kal aaj Jory Bite karke koi leke aaya ya Jolly leke aaya hai. Kal hoke woh ek word change karke koi dusri company aayegi woh aapke saath registered hogi. Parso koi ek company aayegi woh bhi aapke saath aise registered hogi. Toh iska meaning toh yeh hua na ki usme IndiaMART ka kuch lena dena nahi hai. Hazaro log aaye paisa de jaaye bas baat khatam wohi hua na.
Executive: Sir dekhiye IndiaMART kisi ko bhi jab register karati hai, validate karti hai toh woh kuch basic documents hai jo ki woh post karti hai.
Customer: Arre par mam aap itna dekhiye meri baat suniye woh same class ka company hai, same product ka company hai. Aapko maine itna bhi prove karke dikha diya ki bhai usne hamara packaging se leke naam se leke us hisab se yeh kaam kar raha hai. Fir usse zyada toh hum log kya proof de usko? Aur toh kya proof denge?
Executive: Sir bas main ek chota sa example de du aapko agar aap yeh cheez aap le kar ke normally agar offline bhi ja kar ke us pe case kara aapne, theek hai? Aapne ja kar ke wahan pe aap jab court mein rahoge uske us samne wale ne aapko prove karne bolega toh aap technically aap kaise
Customer: Karunga na. Arre par main aapko de raha hu na. Main aapko uska example de raha hu ki yeh already yeh jo customer hai jo bhi aapka customer hai. Okay? Toh kal hoke aise 100 customer aapke paas aa jayenge. Uske same competition wale ya same aisa kaam karne wale toh aapke portal pe kaun rahega?
Executive: Sir agar aapke paas proof hai ki aap prove kar sakte ho apna right.
Customer: Maine bata diya na aapko proof arre par woh maine aapko prove kara ke un us time pe aapne mere paas aapne woh video meet kiya, maine aapko dikha diya iska naam yeh tha pehle. Okay? Aur abhi iska naam yeh hai.
Executive: Sir aapki baat theek hai main wohi toh bol rahi hu sir yeh humari understanding ke liye samajhne ke liye theek hai ki haan hume samajh mein aa raha hai ki isne kya kiya.
Customer: Arre nahi par toh aapki team ko samajh mein nahi aa raha hai. Main nahi prove ki kaise karne ka? Usme uska abhi trademark registration nahi hua hai. Mera trademark registration already book hai.
Executive: Sir aapka trademark registration Jory Bites ke liye hai sir aap yeh nahi samajh rahe ho usme Jolly Bites diya hai. Naam toh similar hai but naam different hai yeh.
Customer: Toh matlab aise naam ke hai na.
Executive: [Inaudible]
Customer: Arre jaane do na chalo na tum log kuch nahi kar paoge jaane do na mere ko usme padhna hi nahi hai ab jaane do. Okay. Bekar ki baat karne ka koi meaning nahi hai. Hamari service kaisi chal rahi hai kya nahi rahi hai woh bhi kuch puchne ki bhi zarurat nahi hai. Jaisa chal raha hai woh chalne do. Barabar hai? Abhi woh wala time nahi hai hamare paas.
Executive: Sir dekhiye agar main aapko gol gol ghuma ghuma ke baat bolti 10 jagah aapka time leti aisa nahi chalega na jo facts hai main aapko facts bataungi.
Customer: Arre par mam dekho mere ko benefit nahi ho raha hai. Dekho mere ko benefit hi ho nahi ho raha hai us portal se toh main kyun uske paas dimag lagau aur time bigadu. Main kyun bigadu?
Executive: Ji sir main aapko aaj bhi bol rahi hu agar aapke paas documents hai aap mujhe share kijiye humare.
Customer: Par share kya karne ka mam yeh toh thodi na kaisi baat ho gayi mam.
Executive: Aap certificate share kijiye jahan pe aap prove kar sakte hai ki Jory Bites jo hai usse aap registered hai, simple. Aapke paas Jory Bites ki hai isi wajah se agar Jory ke naam se koi bhi aayega toh main usko remove kar sakti hu, inka aayega bhi nahi.
Customer: Arre mam aapko arre mam aap itna samjhiye aaj koi objection usko objection mein dala hua hai. Barabar hai? Toh aap samajh sakte ho ki usko objection ab uska kaam toh jab woh agle saal roll change kar dega tab tak toh hum khatam ho jayenge na. Tab tak toh hamara kaam khatam ho jayega na. Hamara toh yeh teen mahine ka kaam hai teen mahine mein hi hum log abhi hi khatam ho gaye toh abhi kya aapke saath baat karenge? Woh wala time nahi rehta hai mam aap samajh nahi rahe business practically samajhna aapke bas bas ka kaam nahi hai mam. Okay? IndiaMART ka ek hi kaam hai paisa do service chale toh chalao nahi chale toh koi baat nahi agle saal dusra hoga yahi kaam hai. Okay? Dusra kuch kaam nahi hai.
Executive: Sir aap aap mujhse aap naraaz ho rahe hai bas.
Customer: Arre naraaz nahi main main main aapko mere ko tum toh kaisi baat ho tum ladke ho mere ko prove karao aisi baat ho gayi hai. Yeh jo baat hai na aapki IndiaMART ki woh aisi baat hai ki bhai aap ladke ho hume prove karo. Okay? Aur yeh har saal prove kar kar ke hum log aapke saath se thak gaye ab. Yeh maine galti kar diya. Kyunki abhi hamare paas woh wala time nahi hota hai mam. Aap samajhiye September se leke January end tak hamare paas baat karne ka time nahi hota hai aapko pata nahi hoga uske liye. Aur uske wajah se hamara kya nuksan ho raha hai kya nahi ho raha hai main aapko woh face karke bata nahi sakta hu.
Executive: Sir maine aapko apne har ek level se connect karwaya hai, maine har ek level se baat karai hai, humari leader team tak aapko connect karwaya hai.
Customer: Ha toh par main kahan pe bol raha main kya bol raha hu? Abhi aap nahi kar sakte toh baat khatam ho gayi toh fir call karne ka koi kya meaning hai? Kya hume kyun feedback le rahe ho? Hamara feedback humne bata diya hai.
Executive: Sir baki service ke liye toh main baat karungi na ki yeh call.
Customer: Service kaise acha hoga mam? Dekho aap service ke regarding baat kar rahe ho main mera service kaise acha hoga mere ko yeh bataiye. Service mein aap kya baat karoge mere saath baat karoge ki service kya kya chal raha hai toh main kya jawab dunga? Mere ko yeh bataiye main kya jawab dunga? Kyunki mere paas woh wala time thode na ki main ek ek toh baat karta rahunga yeh karta rahunga woh karta rahunga. Arre mam jo problem hai woh sort out karte nahi hai na aap log.
Executive: Sir humare end se jitna possible tha humne kara hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi hai meri baat suniye aapne kiya hai toh theek hai nahi kiya hai toh koi baat nahi hai aap apne hisab se karo hume koi farak padta nahi hai hum log apne hisab se jo karna hai woh karenge. Hamare ko IndiaMART ki help do ya na do hume koi farak nahi padega. Barabar hai? Aap bol rahe hai aapne hath khade kar diye hum koi baat nahi hai. Usme koi farak nahi pad jayega. Okay? Aise samajh lenge ki bhai kuch toh khana khilane ke liye paisa de diya tha aisa samajh lenge. Okay?
(silence)
Customer: Chalo rakhta hu main.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting benefits from IndiaMART.

- Competitor is copying their product.

- IndiaMART is not helping to resolve the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the trademark issue.

- Executive asked to share documents to prove.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trademark, registration, competitor, service, proof
